import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./productLIst.css"; import clothe1 from "../images/brand-01.png"; import clothe2 from "../images/brand-02.png"; import clothe3 from "../images/brand-03.png"; import clothe4 from "../images/brand-04.png"; import clothe5 from "../images/brand-05.png"; const products = [ { id: 1, category: 'clothing', img: clothe1, }, { id: 2, category: 'clothing', img: "../images/brand-02.png" }, { id: 3, category: 'clothing', img: "https://picsum.photos/200/200" }, { id: 4, category: 'clothing', img: "https://picsum.photos/200/200" }, { "https://picsum.photos/200/200" } ]; const ProductList = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState('all'); // Filter the products based on the selected category const filteredProducts = menu === 'all' ? products : products.filter(product => product.category === menu); return ( <>
  • setMenu('all')}> All
  • setMenu('electronics')}> Electronics
  • setMenu('clothing')}> Clothing
  • setMenu('accessories')}> Accessories
{filteredProducts.map(product => ( ))}
); }; export default ProductList;
